structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Construction against implicit repeal of KRS 381.9101 to 381.9207.
law.text: KRS 381.9101 to 381.9207 being a general act intended as a unified coverage of its subject matter, no part of it shall be deemed to be impliedly repealed by subsequent legislation if that construction can reasonably be avoided.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 9, effective January 1, 2011.
